Module it.polimi.ingsw.am16

Package it.polimi.ingsw.am16.client.view.gui.events

package it.polimi.ingsw.am16.client.view.gui.events
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.am16.client.view.gui
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.am16.client.view.gui.util
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddCardToHandEvent
    Event fired in the GUI when a new card has to be added to the player's hand.
    AddCardToOtherHandEvent
    Event fired in the GUI when a new card has to be added to the another player's hand.
    AddChatMessagesEvent
    Event fired in the GUI when (a) new chat message(s) is (are) received.
    AddPlayerEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when a new player joins the current lobby.
    ChoosingColorsEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when the color-choosing phase of the game has begun.
    DrawingCardsEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when cards are being drawn for the game.
    ErrorEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when an error occurs.
    GUIEventTypes
    Class that contains all the types of custom events which will be fired in the GUI.
    NotifyDontDrawEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when the game is about to finish, so cards should no longer be drawn from this point on.
    PlayCardEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when a new card is played.
    PromptColorChoiceEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when it is the player's turn to choose their color.
    PromptObjectiveChoiceEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when the player has to choose their personal objective.
    PromptStarterChoiceEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when the player has to choose on which side to place their starter card.
    RejoinInformationEndEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when information about a game which is being resumed is about to be sent.
    RejoinInformationStartEvent
    Event that is fired in GUI when information about a game which is being resumed is done being sent.
    RemoveCardFromHandEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when a card has to be removed from the player's hand.
    RemoveCardFromOtherHandEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when a card has to be removed from another player's hand.
    SetColorEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when a player has chosen their color.
    SetCommonCardsEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI to tell the view which cards the players can draw from.
    SetCommonObjectivesEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI to tell the view what the common objectives for the game are.
    SetDeckTopTypeEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when the type of the card on top of a deck changes.
    SetEndGameInfoEvent
    Event fired in the GUI when the game ends and info about the winners and all the personal objectives are sent to the clients.
    SetGamePointsEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when the number of game points of a player changes.
    SetGamesListEvent
    Event fired in the GUI when the list of active games is communicated by the server.
    SetGameStateEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when the state of the game changes.
    SetHandEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when the player's hand of cards is being communicated by the server.
    SetObjectivePointsEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when the number of objective points scored by a player is calculated.
    SetOtherHandEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when the another player's restricted view of the hand of cards is being communicated by the server.
    SetPersonalObjectiveEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when the player's personal objective is set.
    SetPlayAreaEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when an entire play area is being communicated by the server.
    SetPlayersEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when the list of players currently in a lobby is being given.
    SetStartOrderEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when the server has established the order in which players will play.
    SignalDeadlockEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when a player has deadlocked themselves, and thus their turn is being skipped.
    SignalDisconnectionEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when a player disconnects from the current lobby.
    SignalGameDeletionEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when a player disconnects from a game, and the game is being deleted as a result.
    SignalGameSuspensionEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when a player disconnects from a game, and the game is being suspended as a result.
    TurnEvent
    Event that is fired in the GUI when a new turn starts.
